Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Ouverture in D major, HWV 456/5

c. 1727

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of the overture to the opera Riccardo I (HWV 23).

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/19 · BA 4043 · Einzeln überlieferte Instrumentalwerke II · ed. Terence Best

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
